Temp/
Obj/
UserSettings/
MemoryCaptures/
Build/
Builds/
ExportedObj/
.gradle/
CrashReports/
.vs/
.idea/

# Autogenerated files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Unity3D meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Visual Studio specific
.vs/
*.csproj.user

# Jetbrains Rider plugin
/[Aa]ssets/Plugins/Editor/JetBrains*

# Temporary files
sysinfo.txt
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage
*.app
crashlytics-build.properties

# Addressables and auto-generated Android Assets
/[Aa]ssets/[Aa]ddressable[Aa]ssets[Dd]ata/*/*.bin*
/[Aa]ssets/[Ss]treamingAssets/aa.meta
/[Aa]ssets/[Ss]treamingAssets/aa*
